title: Was Bald Head Island ever a part of New Hanover County?
text:
Actually, following up,Bald Head likely was part of New Hanover before
parts of New Hanover and Bladen counties came together to form
Brunswick County in the 1700s. Histories show that the southern
boundary of New Hanover wasn't clearly defined, though.



Here's a good reference:
http://digital.lib.ecu.edu/historyfiction/item.aspx?id=hon
